text:
I get the message Class Not Found when I deploy a war which contains classes 
(beans in my case) in the directory WEB-INF/classes and trying to access it 
from a jsp. This classes don't belong to any package, if my class belongs to a 
package then I don't get any message and application runs OK.
creator: oscar@vic-on-line.com

text:
I believe this is the expected behaviour - you need to import the class 
explicitly.  i.e. import MyClass
creator: John.Reilly@xelector.com
craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
text:
Can you provide a small WAR file that demonstrates this problem?  You can add it
as an attachment to this bug report.

creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
text:
As indicated in the comments, you must explicitly import a non-packaged bean to
use it in a JSP page.
